description: ff. 170. 266 x 175; 183 x 122 mm. 8-26 lin. (written surface and number of lines vary) autogr. musawwadah, 14th cen. On the traditions in al-Rāfiʻīʼs commentary: ḥājjī Khalīfah, Kashf al-ẓunūn, col. 2003 (VI, 429 Flügel); mutilus (buyūʻ through ṣadaqat al-taṭawwūʻ). Incip. (as extant): ... الثامن والعشرون حدىث نهى عن بىع المجر ... قلت هو بفتح المىم واسکان الجىم قال الجوهرى المجر ان ىباع الشىء
author: Zarkashī, Muḥammad ibn Bahādur, 1344 or 5-1392
title: Takhrīj aḥādīth sharḥ al-Wajīz.
creator: Zarkashī, Muḥammad ibn Bahādur, 1344 or 5-1392
subject: Rāfiʻī, ʻAbd al-Karīm ibn Muḥammad, 1162-1226—ʻAzīz ʻalá al-Wajīz.
member_of_collections: Princeton Digital Library of Islamic Manuscripts
